ARABIC: قَالُوٓا۟ أَضْغَٰثُ أَحْلَٰمٍ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِتَأْوِيلِ ٱلْأَحْلَٰمِ بِعَٰلِمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'A jumbled mass of mixed-up dreams! We do not know the meaning of such things.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They were only confused dreams," they said; "we do not know how to interpret them."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They said: "These are confused dreams, and we do not know the interpretation of such dreams."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They replied, "It is a confused dream and we do not know the meaning of such dreams."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They answered, “These are confused dreams – and we do not know the interpretation of dreams.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "Mixed up false dreams and we are not skilled in the interpretation of dreams."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: Confused dreams, and we do not know the interpretation of dreams.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: A hotchpotch of nightmares!' they said. 'We know nothing of the interpretation of nightmares.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They answered: Jumbled dreams! And we are not knowing in the interpretation of dreams.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They said, "These are confusing dreams and we do not know the interpretation of such dreams."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: medleys of dreams! and in the interpretation of dreams we are not skilled.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘[These are] confused nightmares, and we do not know the interpretation of nightmares.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said: "A confused medley of dreams: and we are not skilled in the interpretation of dreams."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They said: "Mixed up false dreams and we are not skilled in the interpretation of dreams."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They said: 'They are confused nightmares, nor do we know anything of the interpretation of visions'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “Jumbles of dreams, and we know nothing of the interpretation of dreams.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "[It is but] a mixture of false dreams, and we are not learned in the interpretation of dreams."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [12:44] They said, this is, ‘A jumble, a mixture, of dreams! And we are not knowledgeable in the interpretation of dreams’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They) i.e. the soothsayers, sorcerers and fortune-tellers (answered: Jumbled dreams!) these are false and unreal dreams. (And we are not knowing in the interpretation of dreams) we do not know how to interpret dreams.
